mapper.select: select d.days as num ,#{userId} as xm,c.* from (SELECT ADDDATE(y.first, x.d - 1) as d,x.d as days FROM ( SELECT @xi:=@xi+1 as d from (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5) xc1, (SELECT 1 UNION SELECT 2 UNION SELECT 3 UNION SELECT 4 UNION SELECT 5 UNION SELECT 6 UNION SELECT 7) xc2, (SELECT 1 ) xc3, (SELECT @xi:=0) xc0 ) X, ( SELECT '${year}-${month}-01' - INTERVAL DAY('${year}-${month}-01') - 1 DAY AS first, DAY(LAST_DAY('${year}-${month}-01')) AS last) Y WHERE x.d <= y.last) d LEFT JOIN (select * from checkview where YEAR(date) = ${year} and MONTH(date) = ${month} and jlr1811200001 =#{userId} ) as c on d.days=c.day
